amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow military personnel and their dependents overseas to use their own funds to obtain abortion services in military hospitals.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 108-120 to permit Department of Defense facilities, not located in the United States, to perform abortions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanchez, Loretta amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 227 (Roll no. 215).

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Sanchez, Loretta.
